name: Escalate Network Affiliate Plugin
author: Escalate Network

sections.description:
This Plugin Allows Affiliates of Escalate Network to access and post offers within WordPress. View a quick snapshot of your stats for today, yesterday, and month to date. No Need to login to the main system do it all from within your WordPress site.

Backend Features:

  • View a quick snapshot of your revenue for today, yesterday, and month to date.
  • View a quick snapshot of your clicks for today, yesterday, and month to date.
  • Easily browse your Escalate Network offers from the Post screen.
  • Seamlessly Add offer Links or Creatives to your Posts.
  • Browse and insert coupons from Coupons.com with a robust interface.

Front End Features:

  • Affiliate Ads will be displayed to your viewers on the posts of your choice
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

Easy Install

  1. Backup your WordPress Database! Never trust a plugin, even ours.
  2. Go to the plugins screen with WordPress Admin Panel
  3. Search “Escalate Network Affiliate Plugin”.
  4. Install the “Escalate Network Affiliate Plugin” plugin.
  5. Activate Plugin
  6. Go to the new “Escalate Network” entry in the “Settings” dashboard.
  7. Enjoy!
sections.changelog:
1.0.6

  • Load times have been greatly reduced loading statistics and offers.
  • Improved the efficiency of the plugin and API.
  • Fixed bugs with javascript and iframe offers.
  • Provided an isolated preview popup for javascript and iframe offers.
  • Revamped the Coupons.com interface to provide flexible sorting and stylized coupon images.
  • Updated the settings page to interface with the new API.
  • Full compatibility with WordPress 3.4.1
